greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square array read by antidiagonals up: T(n,k) = 1-k if k divides n, else 1.
comment: Transposed variant of A177121. Array variant of A176079.
mathematica: nn = 30; t[n_, k_] := t[n, k] = If[Mod[n, k] == 0, -(k - 1), 1]; MatrixForm[Table[Table[t[n, k], {k, 1, nn}], {n, 1, nn}]]
results.author: _Mats Granvik_, Jun 19 2011
